casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

October 15, 2009

[Cite as 10/15/2009 Case Announcements #2, 2009-Ohio-5501.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2009-1292. State ex rel. Doner v. Logan.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus. Upon consideration of respondents’ motion for expedited discovery, or in the alternative to refer the case to mediation,

It is ordered by the court, sua sponte, that relators shall file a response to the motion for expedited discovery, or in the alternative to refer the case to mediation, no later than 10 a.m. on Monday, October 19, 2009.
